html: (Mosiah 14:1)."Arm of the Lord." The Lord's holy arm is symbolic of the authority of His position and "the power with which he administers divine justice. . . . Thus, his arm may prove to be a blessing or a curse depending upon one's desire for and state of righteousness." (DCE, 26.) As applied to chapter 53 of Isaiah, the arm of the Lord is revealed in the Being of the mortal Messiah.
